name: We Don’t Lie Corp.
description:
You are awakened inside We Don’t lie Corp. Installations, your only goal is to get out of there. But here, you can trust nobody. Everything is lies, everyone lies, there’s no honest one in the entire building. 

We Don’t lie Corp. is a plat former RPG where you have to sort your way out by reverting what everyone says. This game was made for the #ComunityGameJam 2019
It’s actually mine and my team’s first take on a Game Jam before, we didn’t went too crazy because of that (we did include some references though) , but we had a lot of fun, and hope you can enjoy playing our game as well!
